text: Emanuel Jardim Fernandes (born 21 January 1944 in Seixal) is a Portuguese politician. He was a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) from 2004 to 2009 for the Socialist Party; part of the Party of European Socialists.Your MEPs: Emanuel Jardim Fernandes ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:People from Seixal Category:Socialist Party (Portugal) MEPs Category:MEPs for Portugal 2004–2009
title: Emanuel Jardim Fernandes
